title: Topic 005 Question 023
body: A company has a pay-as-you-go subscription named Sub1.
The company has a virtual machine (VM) named VM1 in a subnet named Subnet1.
You create the following network security group (NSG) named NSG1 and associate it with Subnet1.
You observe that an application on VM1 is unable to send email to recipients outside the company.
You need to resolve the issue.
options: Configure the protocol for the NSG1 rule with a priority of 1000 to TCP.
Configure the source and destination ports for the NSG1 rule with a priority of 1000 to 587.
Migrate Sub1 to a cloud service provider subscription.
Remove the NSG1 rule with a priority of 2000.
Assign NSG1 to the network interface on VM1.
